item.title: Could The Best Coder In The World Even Solve This?
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Ok Guys & Girls, i have a serious issue.

I have portforwarded and I’ve checked my ports and they say ports are open : 43594

I’m currently useing Battlescape source and client.

I go into the client and go into the client.java and do this:

return new URL(“revolutionx.zapto.org:” + (43594));

then i go into source and server.java and do this :

public class Server extends Applet implements Runnable {
public Connection myConnection = null;
public Statement myStmt = null;
public final int CYCLE_TIME = 600;
public final int SERVER_PORT = 43594;
public ServerSocket newSocket = null;
public String[] connectedIps = new String[200];
public int[] resetDelay = new int[200];
public int restartTime = 0;//7200;
public boolean keepServerOn = true;
public int garbageCollectDelay = 40;
public int msLag = 0;
public PlayerHandler playerHandler = null;
public NPCHandler npcHandler = null;
public ItemHandler itemHandler = null;
public ShopHandler shopHandler = null;
public MagicHandler magicHandler = null;
public PestControl pc = null;
public static Server s = null;
public WorldObjects worldO = null;

public Server() {
}

Or whatever.

Then I compile both, and I run the client and source, i try and login and I get this error:

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

If anyone could help me that would be sensational (REP +++)

Regards,
James

Read full topic
item.source: Could The Best Coder In The World Even Solve This?
